data.name: Release 1.19.0 (Happy Chinese National Day!)
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- Title should not end with dot. [#213](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/213)
- Update university-place list. [#214](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/214), [#212](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/212)
- Shoutcuts to run lint and fix (Ctrl + Alt + L). [#219](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/219)

### Fixed

- Fix toSentenceCase `southwest China` to `southwest china`. [#227](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/227)
- Lint on group not work (preference).
- Do not run lint when new item. [#211](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/211)  

## Notes  

Full Changelog: [v1.18.7...v1.19.0](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.18.7...v1.19.0).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.19.0/total)

data.name: Release 1.18.0
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- 将短标题（shortTitle）一并转为句子式大写。  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).

data.name: Release 1.17.0
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- 标题句子式大写转换支持月、周、国家城市、大洲大洋等专有名词。/ Support special word for sentence case. resolve: [#171](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/171), fix: [#31](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/31)  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.16.11...v1.17.0](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.16.11...v1.17.0).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.17.0/total)

data.name: Release 1.16.11
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Fixed

- 修复军事院校的地点无法填充的问题。closes: [#126](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/126), fix: [#189](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/189)

### Changed

- 优化语言识别方式：当 TinyLd 没有返回有效语言时，检测文本是否存在中文字符，若存在，返回 `zh`，否则返回 `en`。 close: [#164](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/164)， close: [#190](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/190), ref: [#189](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/189)  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.16.10...v1.16.11](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.16.10...v1.16.11).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.16.11/total)

data.name: Release 1.16.8
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- Exposing `getTextLanguage` to other plugins.

### Changed

- Defaults to "en" when the language of the item is not recognized.  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).

If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4). ## What's changed  

### Fixed

- 临时修复 beta 77 上所有功能失效的问题。ref: [#182](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/182)

### Known issues

- 处理时，右下角弹窗插件图标不显示。  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).

data.name: Release 1.16.0
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- 标题句子式大写转换支持自定义术语。close: [#58](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/58)
- 自定义期刊缩写数据支持 CSV 文件。close: [#65](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/65)

### Fixed

- 手动触发 Lint 时忽略非常规条目（笔记、附件等）。  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.15.4...v1.16.0](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.15.4...v1.16.0).

data.name: Release 1.15.1
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Fixed

- 对预印本，从 Semantic Scholar 更新数据时，优先使用 ArXiv ID，而不是 DOI。close: [#161](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/161#issuecomment-2002960446)  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.15.0...v1.15.1](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.15.0...v1.15.1).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.15.1/total)

data.name: Release 1.15.0
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Changed

- 检测重复条目和检测网页条目现在在每一次 lint 都执行，而不是仅在导入条目时执行。
- 使用新的快捷键注册方式。

### Added

- 检测是否有预印本被错误存为期刊文章。close: [#137](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/137)
- 规范页码连接符的格式。close: [#134](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/134)

### Fixed

- 修复前一版本从 Semantic Scholar 更新预印本时将期刊文章存为会议的问题。  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.14.0...v1.15.0](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.14.0...v1.15.0).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.15.0/total)

data.name: Release 1.14.0
data.body:
## What's changed  

### Added

- 支持从 Semantic Scholar 更新预印本数据。close: [#161](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/issues/161)

### Fixed

- 修复从 ArXiv 更新预印本正式 DOI 不可用的问题。  

## Notes  

The current version is only compatible with Zotero 7. If your are using Zotero 6, please download the [version 0.4.4](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/releases/tag/0.4.4).  

Full Changelog: [v1.13.1...v1.14.0](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/compare/v1.13.1...v1.14.0).  

Historical Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/northword/zotero-format-metadata/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).  

![GitHub release (by tag)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/northword/zotero-format-metadata/v1.14.0/total)
